content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (3 1/2) pound broiler-fryer chicken, cut up" )

content.text: 1 pound new potatoes, cut into chunks
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 pound new potatoes, cut into chunks" )
( ing-7 "1/4 cup chopped fresh dill weed" )

content.text: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, brown chicken and potatoes in oil for 10-15 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "brown"@40:45 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "chicken"@46:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "potatoes"@58:66 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "oil"@70:73 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-0-0 "10-15 minutes"@78:91 / DUR )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@27:38 / TEMPERATURE )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@6:21 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Remove chicken and potatoes; set aside.
3) To drippings, add cream, salt and pepper; stir to mix.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "add"@17:20 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cream"@21:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@28:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "pepper"@37:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "drippings"@6:15 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "stir"@45:49 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-3-0 "to mix"@50:56 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Return chicken and potatoes to skillet.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Return"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken"@10:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "potatoes"@22:30 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-4-0 "skillet"@34:41 / TOOL )
	)
)

( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Sprinkle"@3:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "onions"@17:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "dill"@28:32 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Cover and simmer for 50-60 minutes or until chicken juices run clear and potatoes are tender.
7) With a slotted spoon, remove chicken and potatoes to a serving platter; keep warm.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "remove"@25:31 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken"@32:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "potatoes"@44:52 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "a serving platter"@56:73 / TOOL )
		:instrument ( tool-7-1 "a slotted spoon"@8:23 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "keep"@75:79 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "warm"@-1:-1 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Add sour cream to pan; stir to mix and heat through.

content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Serve"@4:9 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "chicken"@15:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "potatoes"@27:35 / FOOD )
	)
)
